alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 2:28AM PST until January 13 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches below 6000 feet and 7 to 12 inches above 6000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Southwest Elko County and South Central Elko County. * WHEN...From 10 PM Friday to 10 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Active snowfall and strong winds will create hazardous road conditions such as slick, icy roads, drifting snow covering roads, poor visibility, and crosswinds along US 93.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County
